menu.tobeto_mission: Tobeto; discovers talents, develops them, and prepares them for new jobs.
menu.ready_candidates: Trains candidates ready for employment to meet the changing talent needs of organizations.
menu.evaluation_content: Access to a large pool of evaluated and trained talents, along with assessment, selection, and reporting services.
menu.bootcamp_content: Access to a large pool of evaluated and trained talents, along with assessment, selection, and reporting services.
menu.matching_content: Fast and accurate hiring for flexible, remote, full-time workforce.
menu.support_existing_skills: Supports updating existing skills or gaining new ones according to the needs of employees.
menu.assessment_tools_content: Technical and competency assessment tools for candidates who want to gain new skills (reskill) or start a new role (upskill).
menu.training_content: Participation in trainings opened according to the needs of gaining new expertise skills and competencies for a new role, and the possibility of opening special classes for the institution.
menu.development_content: Support for the development and positioning of the existing talent pool in line with corporate goals.
menu.contact_us_title: Contact us for custom training packages and bootcamp programs for companies
